tasks.start: deno task build && deno task start:deno
tasks.build: deno task build:gweb && deno task build:deno && deno task build:importmap
tasks.build:gweb: deno task build:gweb:client && deno task build:gweb:server
tasks.build:gweb:client: "c:/Program Files/National Instruments/G Web Development Software/gwebcli.exe" build-application -p ../Deno/Deno.gwebproject -t "Default Web Server" -n Client.gcomp
tasks.build:gweb:server: "c:/Program Files/National Instruments/G Web Development Software/gwebcli.exe" build-application -p ../Deno/Deno.gwebproject -t "Default Web Server" -n Server.gcomp
tasks.publish: deno task build && deno task publish:deployctl
tasks.publish:deployctl: cd ./Builds/ && deployctl deploy --import-map="./Server_Default Web Server/import_map.json" "./Server_Default Web Server/main.ts"
